name: AZSG - Another Zombie Survival Game
description:
An inovative zombie survival game, developed by gamers to gamers.

The idea is get the best features in others games and make a inovative and fun game.
This DEMO game began to be developed almost a year ago, catching some ideas of games like RUST and DayZ.

I decided to make it available here to raise funds to buy assets and other packages to improve quality and add new features.

Please, help us sending ideas and sugestions.

Windows and Linux Versions soon.

We are a small team (3 people), we live in Brazil and want to contribute to the game world, creating something new and that people like to play.
